channel.title: samsung on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in samsung on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-07
item.description: Samsung takes a stab at its own immersive metaverse store (3 minute read) Samsung 837X is an immersive metaverse experience that will be open in Decentraland for a limited time.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-12
item.description: Here’s everything Samsung announced at its August Unpacked event (3 minute read) Samsung announced four new devices at its August 11 Unpacked event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-26
item.description: Tesla partners with Samsung on new 5nm chip for full self-driving, report says (2 minute read) A report from Korea says that Tesla is partnering with Samsung to develop a 5-nanometer chip for self-driving.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-19
item.description: Samsung’s top executive gets 30 months in prison for bribery (2 minute read) Samsung’s leader, Lee Jae-yong, has returned to prison after his case was retried.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-31
item.description: Huawei tops Samsung as world’s No. 1 smartphone company for first time (2 minute read) Huawei has surpassed Samsung as the world’s number one supplier of smartphones.
